span.span: This is a serialization format, don't remove the private fields.

summary.span: 如果为 true，则应用程序将使用 WPF 的 xbap 应用程序模型在 IE 中运行。

span.span: If true, the application will run in IE using WPF's xbap application model.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否在浏览器中承载要部署的应用程序。如果是，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the application being deployed will be hosted in a browser (), or not ().

value.span: 值仅适用于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序。

span.span: applies only to WPF Web Browser Applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序以外的项目类型，应将设置 为 `False` (默认值) 。For project types other than WPF Web Browser Applications, you should set to `False` (the default value). 部署 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序时，必须将属性设置 为 `True` 。When you deploy a WPF Web Browser Application, you must set the property to `True`. 这会导致将 `` 标记添加到生成的应用程序清单。This causes the `` tag to be added to the generated application manifest. 此标记可让 ClickOnce 为包含 xbap 文件的浏览器承载的应用程序部署项目。This tag enables ClickOnce to deploy projects for browser-hosted applications, which contain .xbap files. 你还必须通过将设置为来使应用程序仅在联机时可用 `False` 。You will also have to make the application available only online by setting to `False`. 如果未执行此操作，将收到 [MSBuild 错误 MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140))。If you do not do this, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140)).

summary.span: 指示应用程序图标文件。

span.span: Indicates the application icon file.

summary.span: 应用程序图标会在生成的应用程序清单中显示出来，并用于“开始”菜单和“添加/删除程序”对话框。

span.span: The application icon is expressed in the generated application manifest and is used for the start menu and Add/Remove Programs dialog.

summary.span: 如果未指定此输入，则使用默认图标。

span.span: If this input is not specified then a default icon is used.

summary.span: 对于 Win32 本机清单，将忽略此输入。

span.span: For a Win32 native manifest, this input is ignored.

value.span: 表示图标文件名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the icon file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序图标在生成的应用程序清单中表示，并用于 " **开始** " 菜单和 " **添加或删除程序**"。The program icon is expressed in the generated application manifest and is used for the **Start** menu and **Add or Remove Programs**. 如果未指定此图标文件，则使用默认图标。If this the icon file is not specified, a default icon is used. 对于本机 Win32 清单，将忽略此输入。For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

span.span: Indicates whether the manifest is a ClickOnce application manifest or a native Win32 application manifest.

summary.span: 指定 ClickOnce 应用程序部署中允许的最大文件路径长度。

span.span: Specifies the maximum allowable length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.

summary.span: 如果指定此值，则会根据此限制检查应用程序中每个文件路径的长度。

span.span: If this value is specified, then the length of each file path in the application is checked against this limit.

summary.span: 超出该限制的任何项都会引发警告消息。

span.span: Any items that exceed the limit will result in a warning message.

summary.span: 如果此输入未指定或为零，则不会执行任何检查。

span.span: If this input is not specified or is zero, then no checking is performed.

summary.span: 对于 Win32 本机清单，将忽略此输入。

span.span: For a Win32 native manifest, this input is ignored.

value.span: 一个整数，它指示 ClickOnce 应用程序部署中允许的最大文件路径长度。

span.span: An integer that indicates the maximum allowed length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OSVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OSVersion : string with get, set

summary.span: 指定应用程序所需的最低 OS 版本。

span.span: Specifies the minimum required OS version required by the application.

summary.span: 对于 Windows XP，示例值为“5.1.2600.0”。

span.span: An example value is "5.1.2600.0" for Windows XP.

summary.span: 如果未指定此输入，则使用默认值。

span.span: If this input is not specified a default value is used.

summary.span: 默认值是 .NET Framework 支持的最低 OS，对于 Windows 98SE，则为“4.10.0.0”。

span.span: The default value is the minimum supported OS of the .NET Framework, which is "4.10.0.0" for Windows 98SE.

summary.span: 但是，如果应用程序包含任何本机或免注册 COM 引用，则默认使用 Windows XP 版本。

span.span: However, if the application contains any native or Reg-Free COM references, then the default will be the Windows XP version.

summary.span: 对于 Win32 本机清单，将忽略此输入。

span.span: For a Win32 native manifest, this input is ignored.

value.span: 表示应用程序所需最低操作系统版本的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the minimum required operating system version required by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定应用程序所需的最低操作系统版本。Specifies the minimum operating system version required by the application. 对于 Windows XP，示例值为“5.1.2600.0”。An example value is "5.1.2600.0" for Windows XP. 如果未指定此输入，则使用默认值。If this input is not specified, a default value is used. 默认值是 .NET Framework 支持的最低操作系统，即 Windows 98SE 的 "4.10.0.0"。The default value is the minimum supported operating system of the .NET Framework, which is "4.10.0.0" for Windows 98SE. 但是，如果应用程序包含任何本机或无可用的 COM 引用，则默认为 Windows XP。However, if the application contains any native or Reg-Free COM references, the default is Windows XP. 对于本机 Win32 清单，将忽略此输入。For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Product { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Product : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
[set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 指定应用程序的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the application.

summary.span: 如果未指定此输入，则不会将产品写入应用程序清单。该名称将用作“开始”菜单上的快捷方式名称，且会成为“添加/删除程序”对话框中显示的名称的一部分。

span.span: If this input is not specified then the Product is not written into the Application Manifest This name is used for the shortcut name on the Start menu and is part of the name that appears in the Add/Remove Programs dialog.

value.span: 与项目文件中 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 `ProductName` 项目文件中的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the `ProductName` property in the project file. 默认值为 NULL。The default is null. 如果 `ProductName` 为 null 并且 为 `True` ，则注册表中的 RegisteredOrganization 值将写入到应用程序清单中。If `ProductName` is null and is `True`, the RegisteredOrganization value in the registry is written to the application manifest. 如果 RegisteredOrganization 也为 null，则使用程序集名称。If RegisteredOrganization is also null, the assembly name is used.

summary.span: 指定应用程序的发布者。

span.span: Specifies the publisher of the application.

summary.span: 如果未指定此输入，则不会将发布者写入应用程序清单。该名称将用作“开始”菜单上的文件夹名称，且会成为“添加/删除程序”对话框中显示的名称的一部分。

span.span: If this input is not specified then the Publisher is not written into the Application Manifest This name is used for the folder name on the Start menu and is part of the name that appears in the Add/Remove Programs dialog.

value.span: 与项目文件中 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 `PublisherName` 项目文件中的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the `PublisherName` property in the project file. 默认值为 NULL。The default is null. 如果 `PublisherName` 为 null 并且 为 `True` ，则将程序集名称写入应用程序清单。If `PublisherName` is null and is `True`, the assembly name is written to the application manifest.

summary.span: 指定在“添加/删除程序”对话框中为应用程序显示的链接。

span.span: Specifies the link that appears in the Add/Remove Programs dialog for the application.

summary.span: 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或 UNC 路径。

span.span: The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.

value.span: 与项目文件中 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 `SupportUrl` 项目文件中的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the `SupportUrl` property in the project file. 默认值为 NULL。The default is null. 如果 `SupportUrl` 为 null 并且 为 `True` ，则向应用程序清单写入一个空字符串。If `SupportUrl` is null and is `True`, an empty string is written to the application manifest.

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 如果为 true，则“安装”将在信任提示符下使用应用程序清单中的设置。

span.span: If true, the install will use the settings in the application manifest in the trust prompt.

value.span: 一个布尔值，用于指示是否将 、 和 属性写入应用程序清单。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the , , and properties are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 如果该值为 ，则将这些属性写入应用程序清单。

span.span: If the value is , they are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 如果该值为 ，则忽略这些属性。

span.span: If the value is , these properties are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 、 和 属性设置为 null。By default, the , , and properties are set to null. 仅当为时，才使用它们 `True` 。They are used only if is `True`. 如果此属性为 `True` ，则这些属性的值将写入到应用程序清单中的相应标记。If this property is `True`, the values of these properties are written to the corresponding tags in the application manifest. 如果 `False` (默认值) ，则将忽略这些属性。If is `False` (the default value), these properties are ignored. 此属性与 `UseApplicationTrust` 项目文件中的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the `UseApplicationTrust` property in the project file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 执行各项检查以验证该清单的有效性。

span.span: Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.

summary.span: 在 对象中报告任何生成的错误或警告。

span.span: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用此方法之前，必须设置 属性，使验证能够针对正确版本的 .NET Framework 运行时验证应用程序清单。Before calling this method, you must set the property so that the validation can verify application manifest against the correct version of the .NET Framework runtime.
